Package com.j2igf.framework.core

package com.j2igf.framework.core
This package contains the classes that deal with the core functionality of J2IGF.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BaseContext
    This is the default context that is used when no other context is available.
    Context
    The Context class is the base class for all contexts.
    Engine
    This is the main class of the framework.
    Window
    This class is used to create a window and render to it.
